name: salopbar
description: Uma barra de navegação simples para Arch Linux + Hyprland

scripts.build:install: npm install && arch-meson build && meson install -C build
scripts.build:test: meson setup --prefix "$(pwd)/dist" --reconfigure build && meson install -C build
scripts.start:dev: meson setup --prefix "$(pwd)/dist" --reconfigure build && meson install -C build && dist/bin/salopbar
